results.title: Anticonvulsant Profile of Selected Medium-Chain Fatty Acids (MCFAs) Co-Administered with Metformin in Mice in Acute and Chronic Treatment
results.text_hl: More research is needed to explain its action in @<m>DISEASE_Epilepsy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004827 @@@epilepsy@@@. The clinical pharmacokinetics of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ are well characterized in @SPECIES_9606 @@@humans@@@.

results.title: The possible role of progranulin on anti-inflammatory effects of metformin in temporal lobe epilepsy.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Epilepsy_Temporal_Lobe @DISEASE_MESH:D004833 @@@TLE@@@ was induced by intracerebroventricular microinjection of @CHEMICAL_Kainic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007608 @@@kainic acid@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ was orally administered for two weeks before the induction of @<m>DISEASE_Epilepsy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004827 @@@epilepsy@@@.

results.title: AMPK role in epilepsy: a promising therapeutic target?
results.text_hl: Despite the potential of @GENE_PRKAA1 @GENE_5562 @@@AMPK@@@-targeted therapies, several aspects warrant further exploration, including the detailed mechanisms of @GENE_PRKAA1 @GENE_5562 @@@AMPK@@@'s role in different brain regions, the impact of @GENE_PRKAA1 @GENE_5562 @@@AMPK@@@ under various conditional circumstances such as @DISEASE_Wounds_and_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D014947 @@@neural injury@@@ and zinc toxicity, the long-term safety and efficacy of chronic @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use in @<m>DISEASE_Epilepsy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004827 @@@epilepsy@@@ treatment, and the potential benefits of combination therapy involving @GENE_PRKAA1 @GENE_5562 @@@AMPK@@@ activators.

results.title: Evaluation of the ameliorative effects of oral administration of metformin on epileptogenesis in the temporal lobe epilepsy model in rats.
results.text_hl: This study was designed to evaluate the ameliorative effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the progression of @<m>DISEASE_Epilepsy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004827 @@@epilepsy@@@ in the @DISEASE_Epilepsy_Temporal_Lobe @DISEASE_MESH:D004833 @@@temporal lobe epilepsy@@@ model in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.
